mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId,user_name AS userName,password,phone,email, job_name AS jobName,job_remark AS jobRemark,salary,authority_name AS authorityName, authority_remark AS authorityRemark,status FROM manager_role WHERE user_name=#{name} AND password=#{password};

SELECT mr.user_id AS userId,user_name AS userName,password,phone,email, job_name AS jobName,job_remark AS jobRemark,salary,authority_name AS authorityName, authority_remark AS authorityRemark,status FROM manager_role mr JOIN vi_role vr ON mr.user_id=vr.user_id WHERE authority_id=#{authorityId};
